revised_title: A Rare Case of Kidney Deficiency and Enlarged Saccus
tldr: The author describes a case of a woman with an enlarged saccus containing water due to the absence of a kidney. The woman had a large belly, but no other symptoms of dropsy. The saccus was connected to various organs and contained a duct that led to the bladder. The case raises several questions about the nature of the saccus and its function.
